Server Logic¶

Storage¶

serverlogic.storage.getPlayer(name)¶

Get user’s player data

serverlogic.storage.readProperties(filepath)¶

Read properties from specified file (filepath). Any required properties that are not specified are set to default values.

serverlogic.storage.storePlayerData(name, data)¶

Store user’s player data

serverlogic.storage.writeProperties(filepath, data)¶

Export server properties (data) to specified file (filepath).

Server functions¶

serverlogic.serverfuncts.addStatusInfo(client, resp)¶

Add needed data based on client’s status.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.closeConn(client)¶

Remove client data and close connection with client

serverlogic.serverfuncts.createGame(client, gamename, sendMsg=True)¶

Attempt to create a game. Response will contain an error message (err) if failed. Status does not change on success.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.gamesList(client)¶

Get list of all games on the server.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.joinGame(client, gamename, sendMsg=True)¶

Attempt to add the client to the specified game. Response will contain error message (err) if failed. Response will contain game data (gamedata) if successful. Status changes to ‘ingame’ on success.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.levelup(client, statname, sendMsg=True)¶

Attempt to level up player. Response will contain error message (err) if failed. Response will contain lobby data (games) if successful. Status changes to ‘inlobby’ on success.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.logMsg(msg)¶

Logs the specified message to std out and the file set my the logging config.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.login(client, username, password, sendMsg=True)¶

Attempt to log client in. Response will contain error response if failed. Response will contain lobby data (games) if successful. Status changes to ‘inlobby’ on success.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.logout(client, sendMsg=True)¶

Attempt to log client out. Response will contain error message (err) if failed. Response will contain if status of ‘logged_out’ successful. Status changes to ‘logging_in’ on success.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.newGame(attr)¶

Get a new game from specified attributes.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.quitGame(client, sendMsg=True)¶

Attempt to quit game. Response will contain error message (err) if failed. Response will contain lobby data (games) if successful. Status changes to ‘inlobby’ on success.

serverlogic.serverfuncts.resetPlayer(player)¶

Reset player data to initial values.

Game functions¶

serverlogic.gamefuncts.attack(client, targetkey)¶

Attempt to attack. Calls executeGameFunct.

serverlogic.gamefuncts.defend(client, targetkey)¶

Attempt to defend. Calls executeGameFunct.

serverlogic.gamefuncts.executeGameFunct(client, gameFunct, targetkey)¶

Attempt to execute specified game function. Response will contain error response if failed. Response will contain lobby data (games) if successful. Status does not change on success.
